original_text: Mary from Magdala and Mary the mother of James were there. They were sitting where they could see the hole in the rock where Joseph had put Jesus' body.
korean_text: 거기 막달라 마리아와 다른 마리아가 무덤을 향하여 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: Mary from Magdala and Mary the mother of James
where they could see the hole in the rock
sentences.korean_translation: 바위의 구멍을 볼 수 있는 곳에

sentences.original_text: where Joseph had put Jesus' body
